What will be learned on the course.1: Basic theory (what is testing ,bug reports, documentation, types, methods, testing area, etc.) SDLC, STLC.
What will be learned on the course.3: HTTP methods of requests to the server
What will be learned on the course.5: Structures of HTTP requests and responses
What will be learned on the course.6: What is JSON, XML. Their structure
What will be learned on the course.7: API testing via Postman (JS, API Autotests)
What will be learned on the course.8: Removing and reading logs from an external.
What will be learned on the course.9: Sniffing http web traffic via Charles and Fiddler.
What will be learned on the course.10: Dev Tools of web browser (Google Chrome, Fire Fox)
What will be learned on the course.11: VPN. (how it works, Why you need it, how to use it, tools option)
What will be learned on the course.14: Building Android Applications on Android Studio
What will be learned on the course.17: Settings up proxy and VPN on iOS and Android
What will be learned on the course.19: Command line (terminal) Linux (copyting, creating, viewing, moving, files on servers without a graphical interface)
What will be learned on the course.20: Basic of bash scripting, automation of routine tasks on the server.
What will be learned on the course.22: SQL basics (Create, delete, drop, Insert, Into, Select, From, Where, Join).
What will be learned on the course.24: Non-relation database Redis (installation, configuration and use).
